actions.text: POSTPONEMENT OF CONSIDERATION - Mr. Gephardt asked unanimous consent that the consideration of the resolution be postponed until the first order of business on Wednesday, November 6, 1991. Agreed to without objection.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
Mr. Gephardt moved to table the measure.
On motion to table the measure Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 265 - 160 (Roll no. 377).

official_title: Presenting a question of the privileges of the House.

summary.text: Directs the Clerk of the House of Representatives to take all necessary steps to notify interested parties, including the Florida Supreme Court, that the House: (1) regrets that official resources were used to prepare a brief against the constitutionality of State-imposed term limitations for Members of Congress; and (2) has no official or unofficial position thereon.

titles.title: Presenting a question of the privileges of the House.
